page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN DEERNESS
page.content: Although a rural community 25% travel to work.{Labour relations}are good and strikes virtually unheard of. At present there is no unemployment. 57% of those working in Deerness are engaged in{farming,}with the other {local employment}being a sub Post Office, General Merchant, tourism, Food Processor, builder, knitwear manufacturer and service industries. Those who{travel to work}include clerical staff, driving instructor, builders, joiners, nurses, teachers, drivers and oil related workers. Many farming families{supplement their {income}by letting houses to tourists, lobster fishing, fish farming, casual labour and knitting. A great many of the people over 65 farm to a lesser extent by renting out fields. Greater use of machinery means that fewer people are needed to farm the area.
